text: Pavel Krupko (born 24 April 1967) is a Soviet rower. He competed in the men's quadruple sculls event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Moldovan male rowers Category:Soviet male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the Soviet Union Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:People from Tiraspol
title: Pavel Krupko
